name: Burglary (quiji)
description:
Entry for the TvGameJam 2019.

Attempt to steal stuff in the neighborhood. Avoid the cops and the sleeping bears. 

How to play:

Use the arrow keys to move.

Press X to stealth, X + X for heavy things, and X + X + X for big heavy things. (must be timed)

Press C to open doors, if the door is locked, use the arrow keys and press C when you find the sweet spot, to cancel, press X.

When you are done stealing things, just run way on the street. Avoid the cops!

The game, coding, music and art was all made by me.

Used assets:

Font: Attacker from @somepex

Sounds: Soundly free sounds and GDC Free sound package.
